_header: Saint Simon and Saint Jude two brethren were
Subjects: saints’ lives; Simon and Jude, saints, lives of
_description: Lives of SS. Simon and Jude in the South English Legendary — couplets

BodAsh43.First Lines:
SEyn Symon & seynt Iude twei breþeren wereMarie sones
                    cleophe as oure bokes ous doþ lere…
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…þer seynt Symon & seynt Iude þe holi apostles
                    tweieEndede hor lif in martirdom & to heuene wende beie

Bod779.First Lines:
Seint symon & seint iude to breþerin wereMarye sonys
                    cleophe as þe bok vs doþ lere…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…Now Ihesu crist al myȝtey king for loue of hem
                    toscheldin vs fram helle pyne nowþe & euer mo
Bod779.Attributed Title: Seint Simon and Seint iude twey apostlus (f. 199v)

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
SEint Symon & seint Iude tweye breþeren wereMaries sones
                    Cleophe as oure bok vs doþ lere…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…þus seint Symond & seint Iude þe holy apostles
                    tweyeEndede here lif in martirdom & to heuen wente beye
BodLauMis463.Note: Two columns per page, one full-line, the other half-line.

BodRawPoe225.First Lines:
Seynt Symon & seynt Ivde tweyn bretheren þei wereMarye
                    Cleophe hir modir was þus the book vs doth lere…
BodRawPoe225.Last Lines:
…God ȝeue vs grace þat we alle may comyn to þat
                    ioyful lyf& marie queen of heuyn halle pray for vs for ȝour ioyes
                    lyf

CULAdd3039.First Lines:
Sayne Symon & sayne Iude two brethir þei wereMary sones
                    Cleophe als our bokes vs lere#eir modre was our lady systre als þe
                    storye saiSayne Jacob als hir sone was whas day falleȝ in þe
                    may…
CULAdd3039.Last Lines:
…þus þeȝ two haly men saynt Symone & Sayne
                    IudeEndid þair lyfe in martirdome & vntil heuene gode

CamCCC145.First Lines:
Sein symon & sein Iude tweie breþeren wereMarie sones
                    cleop he as oure boc us deþ lere…
CamCCC145.Last Lines:
…And sixti þousond men also to cristendom hi
                    broȝteWiþ oute children and wymmen þoru miracle þat hi
                    wroȝte…
CamCCC145.Editions:
D’Evelyn,  Charlotte,  and  A. J. Mill, eds.  
             The South English Legendary: Corpus Christi College Cambridge MS. 145
                and British Museum MS. Harley 2277, with variants from Bodley MS. Ashmole 43 and
                British Museum MS. Cotton Julius D.ix.
EETS
         o.s. 235 (1959), 236 (1956); repr. 1967: 2.448-56.

CamMagPep2344.First Lines:
Twey luþere men þat ham made as godes fforþer hi ffounde
                    þereZaroes and Arphaxat þe schrewes made þo luþer
                    chere…
CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
…Þus Seint Simon and Seint Iude þe holy Apostles
                    tweyeEndede hare lif in martirdom and to heuene wente beye
CamMagPep2344.Note:
Parts of 14 lines on p. 459, parts of 12 lines on p. 460 because most of
                    page torn away; and last 44 lines on p. 461.

CamTCC605.First Lines:
SEint symon & seint Iude twey broþeren wereMarie sones
                    cleophe as bokes ous doþ lere…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…Þus seint symon & seint Iude þe holy appostlis
                    tweyeendede here lif in marterdom & to heuene wende beye

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: SEin simon & seyn Iude tuei breþeren wereMarie sones cleaphe as our bokes ous doþ lere…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …þus sein simon & sein Iude þe holi apostlis tueieendeþe hor lif in martirdom & to heuen wente beie
BLCottJulDIX.Note: “Capitulum lxxi” added to right margin by later hand (f. 156).

BLSto949.First Lines: Seyn Symon & Seyn iude tweye breþren wereMarie sones cleophe as vr bokis vs doþ lere…
BLSto949.Last Lines: …þus Seyn Symon & Seyn Iude þe holy apostles tweyeEnded hor lyf in Martyrdom & to heuene wente beye

Lam223.First Lines:
SAynt symond & saynt Iude two breþeren wereMarie sones
                    Cleophe as oure bokes dos vs lere…
Lam223.Last Lines:
…Þus saynt symond & Iude þe holy aposteles
                    tweyEnded her lyf in martirdom & to heuene wenten beye Amen
Lam223.Note:
In the last line, the scribe wrote ‘he[m]’, then placed two
                    dots (like a diaresis mark) over the word and in the margin repeated the two
                    dots with the correction ‘heuen’.

TokyoTak54.First Lines:
Seynt Symon and seint Iude two breþeren wereMary sones Cleophe
                    as vs þe boke doþ lere…
TokyoTak54.Last Lines:
…Þus seynt Symon and seynt Iude holy apostels tweyeEnded
                    her lif in marterdome and to heuene wente beye
